body_html: should we have a no-arg (or at least no indices, values, shape) constructor, e.g. torch.sparse_coo_tensor()? Because constructing a proper one is complicated or requires using torch.sparse.*Tensor(), which is a style we've moved away from for dense tensors.
body_text: should we have a no-arg (or at least no indices, values, shape) constructor, e.g. torch.sparse_coo_tensor()?  Because constructing a proper one is complicated or requires using torch.sparse.*Tensor(), which is a style we've moved away from for dense tensors.
body: should we have a no-arg (or at least no indices, values, shape) constructor, e.g. `torch.sparse_coo_tensor()`?  Because constructing a proper one is complicated or requires using `torch.sparse.*Tensor()`, which is a style we've moved away from for dense tensors.
